alert.note: Alert for Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 08 at 11:13PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest New Mexico, including the following county, Luna. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1113 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Columbus, Hermanas and Carzalia Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
